function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conceptualizing loneliness as a singular, unidimensional construct","Impact":"Underestimation of the true prevalence of loneliness","Mitigation":"Consider and measure the social and emotional aspects of loneliness separately","Technologies":"Measurement tools for social and emotional loneliness","People":"Individuals experiencing loneliness","Owner":"Researchers, healthcare professionals"},{"Description":"Failure to capture the multidimensionality of loneliness","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of loneliness and its associated risk factors","Mitigation":"Encourage the use of multidimensional frameworks for understanding loneliness","Technologies":"Research methods for exploring different dimensions of loneliness","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Academic institutions, research organizations"},{"Description":"Senior loneliness exacerbated by the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of negative health outcomes in senior populations","Mitigation":"Implement interventions to combat senior loneliness, such as letter writing programs","Technologies":"Digital communication tools for connecting seniors with others","People":"Senior populations","Owner":"Community organizations, healthcare providers"}]}
